svcsubproc.title: Chair Lift Door and Chair Lift
svcsubproc.para: Optional handicapped access requirements are an available option. The wheelchair lift is available in different configurations. Depending on the district requirement the chair lift may be located at the rear side bus, at mid point, or directly behind the passenger entry door ( Fig. 49, Item 1). Depending on the location, the door may swing left or right.

figure.caption: Figure 49. Chair Lift Door (Shown At Rear With Forward Exterior Hinge Assembly)

svcsubproc.para: The chair lift option is available from different manufacturers as may be requested by the customer. The chair lift assembly is mounted directly inside the body by the chair lift door. The entire mechanism, depending on manufacturer, is either all electric control or hydraulically controlled. The chair lift door latching mechanism is equipped with a door open sensor which activates when the handle is opened, and alerts the driver the door is ajar. The chair lift operating functions are detailed in the chair lift operators manual if the bus is so equipped.
